content: round 24 k2tog k10 repeat 3 times 44 sts round 25 k2tog k9 repeat 3 times 40 sts round 26 k2tog k8 repeat 3 times 36 sts round 27 k2tog k7 repeat 3 times 32 sts stuff ball of roving into knitting continue knitting as follows round 28 k2tog k6 repeat 3 times 28 sts round 29 k2tog k5 repeat 3 times 24 sts round 30 k2tog k4 repeat 3 times 20 sts knit 4 rounds cut 7 inch yarn tail and thread through stitches pull yarn tight and weave into knitting thread bottom yarn tail through cast on stitches pull yarn tight and weave into knitting felting include dryer balls with a load of towels and wash with detergent and hot water dry on high heat you may need to repeat the wash and dry process once or twice more to get desired felting after that just use in dryer ©copyright 2021 annie baker all rights reserved this pattern may be used for non-commercial personal use only it may not be used in any publication in print nor should it be reproduced in electronic/digital format without permission please do not photograph share copy or distribute this pattern
